Powered by Cookiebot

  * Consent
  * Details
  * [#IABV2SETTINGS#]
  * About

## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media
features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use
of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may
combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve
collected from your use of their services.

Consent Selection

Necessary

Preferences

Statistics

Marketing

Show details

page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot
function properly without these cookies.

well as dates for the first and most recent visit. Used by Google Analytics.

__utmbRegisters a timestamp with the exact time of when the user accessed the
website. Used by Google Analytics to calculate the duration of a website
visit.

__utmcRegisters a timestamp with the exact time of when the user leaves the
website. Used by Google Analytics to calculate the duration of a website
visit.

segmentation is based on visitor behavior on the website - the segmentation
can be used to target larger groups.

Early Access

# PingOne Neo

Decentralized Identity is Here

Neo gives control of identity data back to your users. It lets you verify IDs,
documents and identity claims including driving licenses, and issue digital
credentials based on those. Users can share digital credentials with
organizations to quickly and effortlessly prove who they are.

See the possibilities

Neo mobile phone screenshots

  * PingOne Neo

  * Credentialing

  * Verification

  * Integrations

  * Decentralized Identity 101





/ˈnēˌō/ prefix a new and different form of something that existed in the past

Diagram identity management

## Identity management completely reimagined

PingOne Neo provides identity verification (proofing), along with digital
credential issuance and verification, so organizations can instantly ensure
users are who they claim to be. Neo saves time by instantly ensuring the
source, validity and accuracy of credentials and reduces costs associated with
issuing physical credentials, managing personal accounts and preferences,
managing eligibility, and mitigating identity theft.



In short, Neo prevents fraudulent transactions, stops account takeovers and
delivers speed-to-trust by putting users in control of their verified
information.

See How

## Everything you need. Nothing you don’t.

People use their digital identity online every single day, whether at work or
at home and with every device. A verifiable credential presents only the
necessary information. If your service only needs to verify the user's age,
only the age will be provided, unlike today where a user would present their
driver's license that contains extraneous information.

Image everything you need

## How Neo Works

Digital services today often require verified information about users to do
business. PingOne Neo makes getting those verified credentials from their
trusted source to the business that needs them simple and secure. Here’s how
it works:

  * ### Request

  * Create

  * Store

  * Present

Request

User requests a verifiable credential from an issuer or service provider.

Mobile phone image Request

### Create

  
The relying party attests the proof the user provided is true and accurate.
Using this information they create a cryptographically signed verifiable
credential.

Mobile phone image Create

### Store

  
The verifiable credential is stored in the owner's digital wallet  

Mobile phone image Store

### Present

Share data that is essential for the interaction to take place. Optional data
is highlighted and not mandatory.

Mobile phone image Present

## Get Hands On with Neo

Visit the PingOne Neo Playground

## Benefits of Neo

### Verify Credentials

Request the verified information that you require from users to do business
and validate that information directly with the source.

### Secure Users

Reduce the possibility of transaction fraud and account takeovers by ensuring
the person behind the credential really is who they claim to be.

### Eliminate Regulatory Risk

Gather, store, and protect only the user data you need, eliminating sensitive
information that malicious actors are after.

### Increase Privacy

Digital credentials allow users to share only necessary identity information
for a specific transaction, such as confirmation of age instead of date of
birth.

### Scalable Interoperability

Digital credentials enable organizations to more affordably and securely
empower their customers to interact in more locations on-line and in-person
without traditional backend integrations.  

## Neo

### Ping’s formula for decentralized identity

Icon Register

PingOne Credentials

Issue verifiable credentials into digital wallets using a variety of standards
and formats, eliminating cost and management of issuing physical credentials.

Icon PingOne Verify

PingOne Verify

Verify the identity of an end user to ensure their verifiable credential is
tied to their real-life identity, ensuring users are who they claim to be.

Icon Orchestrate

PingOne DaVinci

Design seamless experiences by integrating your identity and business services
with no-code, drag-and-drop visual flows.

Start Today

Ready to experience PingOne Neo? We'll get you started in just a few minutes.  

Try Now
